CRYSTAL BALL.Definition: a way of predicting or guessing the future

GAME-CHANGER.Definition: something that would make a big change or difference

TRUMPETED AS.Definition: promoted or talked about loudly as something good

EXCEPTION.Definition: something that is different from the rest or not included

BUNCH.Definition: a group or number of things

BUZZWORDS.Definition: popular or trendy words or phrases

SYNERGY.Definition: two or more things working together to be better than alone

JARGON.Definition: special words used by a specific group or job

OVERSEER.Definition: someone in charge or who watches over

EXCEPTIONAL.Definition: better than normal or very special

COUNTERINTUITIVELY.Definition: in a way that goes against what seems normal or expected

GATEKEEPERS.Definition: people who control access to it

CHOREOGRAPHERS.Definition: people who plan or arrange it

FEASIBLE.Definition: possible or able to be done

OPTIMISTS.Definition: people who believe things will turn out well

BEHIND THE SCENES.Definition: in secret or in the background

TAILORED.Definition: made to fit or suit a specific purpose

INADVERTENTLY.Definition: by accident or without meaning to

DISCOURAGING.Definition: making people lose hope or confidence

PEERS.Definition: people of the same age or status

CLICK.Definition: selecting an option by pressing a button or touching a screen

STEP.Definition: a move in the process or direction

OVERESTIMATE.Definition: think that it is bigger or more important than it is

TRACK RECORD.Definition: a history of what has happened before

UNDERLINE.Definition: show that it is important or highlight

ENGAGED.Definition: actively involved or interested in it

FIRMLY.Definition: in a strong and determined way
